title: Eastern Integrative Health acupuncture, acupressure, herbal medicine
description: Eastern Integrative Health is dedicated to promoting health, wellness & education, including acupuncture, acupressure, herbal medicine, and more.
cleaned_text: | | Enhancing your options for health care, naturally. Eastern Integrative Health is dedicated to promoting health, wellness and education with Traditional East Asian Medicine, including acupuncture, acupressure, herbal medicine, Eastern dietary consults, breath work, and the wisdom of the accumulated East Asian medical perspective rooted in natural medicine and self healing. Three Offices in Chicago ROGERS PARK | LAKEVIEW | | IMPORTANT NOTE REGARDING MASKING: Eastern Integrative Health is a personal health clinic offering acupuncture, herbal medicine, and East Asian Medical approaches to wellness. We are within an office called Chicago Healing Collective, which also offers massage, sports medicine and psychology. Your health, and that of our community, is of the upmost importance to us and is the driving factor behind how we are operating. Due to this we are continuing to ask all clients and practitioners to mask in the shared spaces (hallways, wait rooms) office spaces. Our clients include those who are at risk for immune-compromised health issues and and we aim to provide the best protection we can to anyone vulnerable. We thank you for your continued cooperation. Please see my blog entry below on Tips in Traditional Chinese Medicine management of epidemics for other ideas. | |
